entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers and flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High 8.
